text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/ebbf11c1198b7aec8a1a55f7231ecb4f1a432fa0|patch 8.2.2307: a shell command in the vimrc causes terminal output>
patch 8.2.2307: a shell command in the vimrc causes terminal output

Problem:    A shell command in the vimrc causes terminal output.
Solution:   Do not call starttermcap() after a shell command if the termcap
            wasn't active before.

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.2307: a shell command in the vimrc causes terminal output 路 vim/vim@ebbf11c
attachments.title: patch 8.2.2307: a shell command in the vimrc causes terminal output 路 vim/vim@ebbf11c
attachments.text: Problem: A shell command in the vimrc causes terminal output. Solution: Do not call starttermcap() after a shell command if the termcap wasn't active before.

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/32b3f820107139d7edf0c592bb06f090c3eb6c51|patch 8.2.2306: Vim9: when using function reference type is not checked>
patch 8.2.2306: Vim9: when using function reference type is not checked

Problem:    Vim9: when using function reference type is not checked.
Solution:   When using a function reference lookup the type and check the
            argument types. (issue #7629)
